data.name: Millennium Conflict
data.detailed_description:
Millennium Conflict is a real-time strategy game where you will have to act quickly against attackers who want to conquest the Space!
Enhancing everything which made the original a hit with stylish graphics and addictive gameplay, Millennium Conflict will keep you coming back for more.

Wave after wave, your soldiers will overthrow the enemy colonies and will occupy enemy bases one after another.
Battle through all these 40 challenging levels, upgrade your weapons, recruit new generals to end this battle once and for all.

Game Features :
- 40 unique levels
- Player & weapons upgrade
- 8 Generals to conquer
- In game stats & achievements
- Unique 2d style

Take Control and Smash the Enemies. Side note: You are the only male survivor in this universe.​

data.short_description: Millennium Conflict is a real-time strategy game where you will have to act quickly against attackers who want to conquest the Space. You are the only male survivor in this universe.​ That is your duty now to stand up and fight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
